content: drops 167-20 drops design pattern no de-149 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- measurements height approx 80 cm / 31½ width approx 160 cm / 63 materials drops delight from garnstudio 200 g color no 11 lilac/green drops crochet hook size 3 mm / c or size needed to get 24 treble_crochet x 13 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm note online pattern states it s written in american english it supplies a link for the pattern written in british english and one for the american version
